channel.title: Problem solver gets rep++!
channel.description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
i downloaded dungeonfest i portforwared did cache and changed ip corect. the cache downloaded whit no problems then i had to restart i did that and now it got frozen at connected to update server no errors in cmd
any help please???

item.title: Problem solver gets rep++!
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Then check the IP. It’s probably trying to connect to a webserver that’s non existent. Or… and I doubt it… but check where your cache saved itself and where your Signlink is trying to find your cache.

That’s all I can suggest.

Read full topic

i ran the server first
